## Introduction and Dataset Overview

### Importance of Urban Trees
- 🌳 Urban trees are essential to creating livable cities.
- 🌟 Benefits include:
  - 🌬️ Improving air quality
  - 🌞 Providing shade
  - 🐦 Supporting biodiversity
  - 🏙️ Enhancing urban environments.

### Dataset Overview
- 📊 Source: Vancouver Open Data Portal (2022).  <a href="https://opendata.vancouver.ca/explore/dataset/street-trees/table/?disjunctive.neighbourhood_name&disjunctive.on_street&disjunctive.species_name&disjunctive.common_name&location=11,49.2565,-123.12999&%3D">Street Trees</a>

## Statistical Question and Methods 

### Key Question
- ❓ Do tree heights vary significantly across Vancouver neighborhoods?

### Methods
- 🛠️ For Analysis variations among trees around neighbourhood used Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) for pattern identification and Chi-squared tests for statistical validation.
